subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Knicks, who have dominated the Celtics for three games, will play Game 4 without their second leading scorer, J.R. Smith, who was suspended for his flagrant foul on Boston’s Jason Terry.
snippet: The Knicks, who have dominated the Celtics for three games, will play Game 4 without their second leading scorer, J.R. Smith, who was suspended for his flagrant foul on Boston’s Jason Terry.
